column5: Anyone got any DYI help on adding a livewell to a boat?
I would use a large cooler as the well and pump in water with a over flow to keep the water oxygenated. Try Cabela's or Bass Pro for ideas.
14ft aluminum......  I also own a machine shop.........so i can fab up anything really.......  just not sure on design and how pumps should be setup.
You could allways try searching google also.
